title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 600.23 - Assignment of Commercial Financing Agreements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 600.23 - Assignment of Commercial Financing Agreements

State Regulations

Each recipient may discharge its payment obligations under
any commercial financing by paying the original obligee under such financing
until, but not after, the recipient receives a notification, authenticated by
the original obligee or the obligee's assignee, that the amount due or to
become due has been assigned and the payment is to be made to the
assignee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23
ยง
600.23

Adopted

New

York State Register February 1, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 05, eff. 2/1/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
